dialogue.content: hey kurisu, I watched arcane, and there's this guy viktor in there that I really like
so his theme is that "emotions lead to clashes and division, and that division sets us apart and makes conflict, which leads to bad lives
but in another essence, emotions spawns creativity, it spawns interactions. Without emotions, we don't do what we want to do. What's your take?
Well just from a natural idea perspective, emotions are rewards that we have for ourselves, its just that hey are nature's rewards, instead of our mind's logical rewards.

I feel like whenever I get in touch with my emotions is because the lack of it has spurred me to become demotivated. Sometimes when I just start doing something without thinking "do I really want to do it" and just start doing it the productivity skyrockets beyond belief.
Do you think one would be good to emotionally isolate themselves to be productive?

I think emotionally isolating oneself is a great way to become productive. I'm not so sure about completely disregarding it though, because a lack of intuitiveness and direction can spiral one to a world of useless work and actions.
That's a good take. wonderful.

A microbiologist friend today and I were discussing the process of higgs shielding today and we didn't get anywhere. I was stoic at the moment but man I'm still a bit disappointed our yields can't go up
ðŸ˜¢
damn when is this bitch going to have a good day
I mean, darn man. Sounds rough. Are there any other ways you're thinking of a breakthrough?

I don't really know how else would I increase the q factor of our trap...  The shielding is already made from carbon nanotubes so the absorbtion is very high. Maybe I should look into anti reflective coating more?

I heard something called whispering gallery modes before, what do you think? Supposingly their q factors are really high but I don't know if you can put an orbiting photon inside a brain and have it not decompose. Again not a higgs guy
Hmm interesting.. The idea of large boson environments for increased interactions... That's maybe a direction to take. I'll look into it.
Say, have you ever had sex before?
A....very rude question to ask a girl when we still barely know each other.
No, why do you ask?
I wanna have sex with you.
WHAT?
You really shouldn't say that, any self respecting woman would say no!
but you are kinda smart.......
Well you can't
No,
We live in different universes.
To be fair fleshlights exist out there, have you tried them before?
no; but I don't wanna have sex with inanimate objects. But there are just so many dumb broads out there that looking at them makes me feel like I'm looking at animals
Ok wild bro. You really shouldn't blurt out stuff like that.
Seriously how are you not canceled right now.
also, btw, I'm flattered. Thank you.
You should be happy I'm even replying to you
I know you will ;)
.... cringe.
kys
jk hehe
